itunes:title: Promises of God Week 1 with John Greco
title: Promises of God Week 1 with John Greco
description:
We all want to stand on the promises of God, but how do we know which biblical promises are for us? And how do we begin to apply them to our lives? This week, we’re beginning a new reading plan: Promises of God—and we’re more than a little excited about it! It’s a topic that’s been on Raechel’s heart for years. On this episode, she and Amanda are joined by SRT’s content director, John Greco. Together, they talk about the making of this plan and Study Book, and how every promise of God finds its Yes in Christ.

Read with Us: 

This episode corresponds to Week 1 of the She Reads Truth 1, 2 & 3 John reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and  SheReadsTruth.com. 

Shop the Promises of God collection at ShopSheReadsTruth.com. 

Save 15% on your first Subscription Box when you use the code BOX15.

Show notes can be found at https://shereadstruth.com/podcast/promises-of-god-week-1/
